snippet: The Oscar ceremony will remain in its current location, a theater in the Hollywood district of Los Angeles, through 2033, according to a Tuesday announcement, ArtsBeat blog reported.
abstract: The Oscar ceremony will remain in its current location, a theater in the Hollywood district of Los Angeles, through 2033, according to a Tuesday announcement, ArtsBeat blog reported.

headline.main: Oscars to Remain at Dolby (ex-Kodak) Theater
